attributes.action: formally acknowledge the contribution to music made by The Flaming Stars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its been a long time since The Beatles did anything good, and The Flaming Stars consisting of band members

Joe Whitney - drums
Huck Whitney - guitar
Max Décharné - vocals, keyboards
Mark Hosking - guitar
Paul Dempsey - bass guitar

have been until now, critically and horrifically underrated by the music industry. Spitefully ignored by the majority of their peers, their influence is unmeasurable to those in "the know". Consistently brilliant releases, rare live performances of fantastic quality, all unuttered amongst the nations cultural consciousness. With the Dreadfully unrevered Max Decharne dipping into the literary world to preserve 1950's hipster slang with the publication of a dictionary of terms, means this band as a cultural icon needs to be acknowledged by awarding them MBE's.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
